org.eclipse.dataset

Class BroadcastIterator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.dataset.IndexIterator
      • org.eclipse.dataset.BroadcastIterator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BroadcastPairIterator, ContiguousPairIterator

    public abstract class BroadcastIterator
extends IndexIterator
    Base class for broadcast iterators. For speed, there are public members. Note, index is not updated

      • createStrides

        public static int[] createStrides(int isize,
                                  int[] oShape,
                                  int[] oStride,
                                  int oOffset,
                                  int[] bShape,
                                  int[] stride,
                                  int[] offset)
        Create a broadcasting stride array from dataset and slice information
        Parameters:
        isize -
        oShape - original shape
        oStride - original stride
        oOffset - original offset (only used if there is an original stride)
        bShape - broadcast shape
        stride - output stride
        offset - output offset
        Returns:
        new shape

        Take in shapes and broadcast them to same rank
        Parameters:
        shapes -
        Returns:
        list of broadcasted shapes plus the first entry is the maximum shape
